title: A new droll, or, The counter-scuffle. The second part acted in the middle of High-Lent between the goalers and the prisoners : very pleasant and delghtful [sic] / by J. Jordan, gent.
author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
notes: Attributed to Thomas Jordan by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints; cf. also Camb. Bib. Eng. Lit., 1969, I, 646.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
